summary: Frontend UI testing for TaskAct Admin Panel dark theme, Add New Tenant button, Navigation improvements. All requested features verified working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: AdminPanel.js properly implements dark theme with slate-900/800/700 color scheme
Navigation.js includes divider element (h-6 w-px bg-gray-200) for visual separation
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: UI improvements verified: 1) Admin Panel dark theme (slate-900 background, rgb(15,23,42)), 2) Add New Tenant button visible with data-testid='create-tenant-button', 3) Create Tenant modal has dark theme (slate-800), 4) Company badge with divider in Navigation, 5) Profile dropdown shows Admin Panel link for Super Admin, 6) Gradient profile avatar styling

admin_panel_dark_theme.details: Admin Panel displays with slate-900 background (rgb(15,23,42)), white text, indigo accents

add_new_tenant_button.details: Button visible on Tenants tab with text 'Add New Tenant', data-testid='create-tenant-button'

create_tenant_modal.details: Modal opens with dark theme (slate-800 background), all form fields working: Company Name, Code, Email, Plan, Max Users

company_badge_divider.details: Company badge (e.g., 'Sundesha & Co LLP') shows with visual divider separating it from nav tabs

profile_dropdown.details: Profile dropdown working, shows Change Password, Admin Panel (for Super Admin), Logout options

admin_panel_access.details: Super Admin can access Admin Panel via profile dropdown link

navigation_tabs.details: Dashboard, Tasks, Projects, Timesheet, Attendance tabs properly spaced with data-testid attributes

super_admin_badge.details: Admin badge with Shield icon visible for Super Admin users

frontend_flows_tested: Tenants tab with Add New Tenant button
Create Tenant modal opening and form fields
